sprint_goal: Establish foundational security, user management, and all core master data models (Vehicle, Driver, Customer, Route, Material) to enable subsequent feature development.
Implement the core trip lifecycle workflow from creation to assignment, including all necessary validations and resource status management.
Deliver the MVP for the Driver Portal, enabling drivers to log in, view their trips, update trip status, log events, and upload Proof of Delivery.
Implement the complete expense management workflow from driver submission to manager approval/rejection, and enable trip profitability calculations and exception handling.
Deliver the end-to-end GST e-invoicing and payment tracking functionality, completing the core financial trip-to-cash cycle.
